root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 1-1-1b, translated into en
root.data:
# Methodology
## Computation method
<math> <mi>Working poverty rate</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mi>Employed persons living on less than US$1.90 a day</mi> <mi>Total employment</mi> </mfrac> <mo>×</mo> <mn>100</mn> </math>
